description: The Wasabi Power battery and charger kit includes 2 batteries and one charger with a European plug and car adapter. All items meet or exceed OEM standards and come with a 3-year manufacturer warranty.Batteries replace: Sony NP-FW50Charger replaces: Sony BC-VW1, BC-TRWCompatible with the following Sony models:Alpha 7 (a7)Alpha 7R (a7R)Alpha a3000Alpha a5000Alpha a6000Cyber-shot DSC-RX10NEX-3NEX-3NNEX-5NEX-5NNEX-5RNEX-5TNEX-6NEX-7NEX-C3NEX-F3SLT-A33SLT-A35SLT-A37SLT-A55V
title: Wasabi Power Battery (2-Pack) and Charger for Sony NP-FW50 and Sony Alpha 7, a7, Alpha 7R, a7R, Alpha a3000, Alpha a5000, Alpha a6000, NEX-3, NEX-3N, NEX-5, NEX-5N, NEX-5R, NEX-5T, NEX-6, NEX-7, NEX-C3, NEX-F3, SLT-A33, SLT-A35, SLT-A37, SLT-A55V, Cyber-shot DSC-RX10
